title: Client failing to launch
body: I tried to open up my LoL client today and it came up with the logo then it just vanished? I've tried everything like re-installing the client. deleting the certain RADS folders that have previously been fixed other peoples similar problem but to no success? Has this happened to anyone else and if so could you please share what you did you fix this problem :)

replies.body: Have you tried running it in admin mode via changing it's properties, **not right-clicking and clicking "Run as Administrator..."**?

> [{quoted}](name=Not Real Faker,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=B2EqdAyf,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-06-11T13:16:00.170+0000)
>
> I tried to open up my LoL client today and it came up with the logo then it just vanished? I've tried everything like re-installing the client. deleting the certain RADS folders that have previously been fixed other peoples similar problem but to no success? Has this happened to anyone else and if so could you please share what you did you fix this problem :)

I would love to know if this is happening to other because its the exact same problem. The league of legends badge flashes for like 2 seconds and then nothing happens after. Ive also restarted adn troubleshooted with no help. HELP US RIOT!!
